short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for finding ayah and the translation based on surah and verse selection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension designed to search for a specific Ayah, providing its English translation and audio recitation, based on the given chapter and Ayah number.
